passage_text: For example the median expected annual pay for a typical Contracts Administration Manager in the United States is $110,351, so 50% of the people who perform the job of Contracts Administration Manager in the United States are expected to make less than $110,351.
Compensation for Senior Contracts Managers in the United States is generous, with average pay surpassing six figures annually ($101K).
A Contracts Manager earns an average salary of $79,610 per year. A skill in Contractor Management is associated with high pay for this job. Experience has a moderate effect on income

For example the median expected annual pay for a typical IT Contracts Manager in the United States is $99,048 so 50% of the people who perform the job of IT Contracts Manager in the United States are expected to make less than $99,048.
Average Contract Manager salaries for job postings nationwide are 18% higher than average salaries for all job postings nationwide.

Contract Manager Salary. Contract Manager average salary is $57,271, median salary is $51,012 with a salary range from $22,000 to $218,000. Contract Manager salaries are collected from government agencies and companies. Each salary is associated with a real job position.
